statements: UPDATE movement_data SET x_coordinate = 5, y_coordinate = 10 WHERE user_id = 1 AND timestamp = '2022-01-01 10:00:00';
UPDATE movement_data SET z_coordinate = -3.5, y_coordinate = 7 WHERE timestamp = '2022-02-15 15:30:00' AND user_id = 2;
UPDATE movement_data SET x_coordinate = 10.5, y_coordinate = 20.3, z_coordinate = 15.7 WHERE user_id = 123 AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
UPDATE movement_data SET z_coordinate = 18.9, x_coordinate = 7.2, y_coordinate = 12.6 WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-15 10:00:00' AND user_id = 456;
UPDATE movements SET position_x = 10.5, position_y = 20.8, position_z = 15.3 WHERE user_id = 123 AND timestamp = '2022-01-15 10:30:00'
UPDATE user_behavior SET behavior_type = 'active', duration = 60 WHERE behavior_id = 456 AND user_id = 789
UPDATE movements SET position_x = 10.5, position_y = 20.3 WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_behavior SET duration = 60, behavior_type = 'login' WHERE user_id = 3 AND behavior_id = 5;
UPDATE users SET user_email = 'example@gmail.com' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_scores SET score = 95 WHERE user_id = '234e5678-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND completion_date = '2022-01-15';
UPDATE users SET user_name = 'Alice', registration_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE user_scores SET score = 95.5, completion_date = '2022-02-28' WHERE user_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002' AND completion_date = '2022-01-15';
UPDATE user_info SET age = 30, gender = 'Male' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE simulation_data SET completed = true, platform_version = 'v2.0' WHERE session_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';

UPDATE user_tracking SET position_x = position_x + 10, position_y = position_y - 5, position_z = 20 WHERE user_id = 'a4e4c3d3-b25d-4e69-93fd-8fe659bcff89' AND session_id = 'c18b0e18-daae-4357-8266-257d76c1179c';

UPDATE simulation_data SET platform_version = 'v5.0.2', simulation_date = '2023-12-31', completed = true WHERE simulation_id = '652a0ebf-fdba-4382-9788-86efbe812b2d' AND session_id = 'c18b0e18-daae-4357-8266-257d76c1179c';
UPDATE user_accounts SET username = 'johndoe', last_login_date = '2022-01-20' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_interaction SET interaction_type = 'click', timestamp = '2022-01-21 08:30:00' WHERE session_id = 1001;
UPDATE user_accounts SET email='new_email@example.com' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE user_movements SET movement_duration=45 WHERE movement_id=3;
